results.question: When you were younger, what did you imagine you’d be like when you grew older?
When you were younger, what kind of technology did you imagine would be popular in the future?
When you were younger, what kind of connections with nature did you imagine would exist  in the future?
When you were younger, how did you imagine getting around from place to place in the future?
When you were younger, what did you imagine you would wear in the future?
When you were younger, what did you imagine or dream about new materials?
results.middle: What came true, and what didn’t? Why?
